subject: Build a GUI
description:
As a user I want a GUI to be implemented so that it looks and feels good while using the tool

**Acceptance criteria:**

*   Should be able to pass the commands from the GUI
*   Implement user friendly layouts

**Definition of done:**

*   Able to show feature in the product demo
*   passes tests according to the acceptance criteria

subject: Getting list of committers
description:
As a user, I want to get the list of committers when using guet in alphabetical order so that the list of committers is organized and makes it easier to search for information.

Acceptance criteria:

*   Is able to get the alphabetically ordered list of active committers
*   Does the authorization of the members for the list

Definition of Done:

*   Able to show feature in the product demo
*   passes tests according to the acceptance criteria

subject: Fetch Team Members from Taiga
description:
As a user I want to fetch team members from Taiga so that collaboration becomes easy

Acceptance Criteria:

*   Interact with Taiga API
*   Implement authorization

Definition of Done:

subject: Persistent preferences
description:
As a user I want preferences to be persistent so that I can don't have to add them each time

Acceptance criteria:

Make window persistent and resizable
Add 'User Settings' feature
